parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Balloon style as defined in swBalloonStyle_e

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Balloon size as defined in swBalloonFit_e

parameters.name: UpperTextStyle
parameters.description: Style for the upper text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: UpperText
parameters.description: Upper text of the balloon

parameters.name: LowerTextStyle
parameters.description: Style for the lower text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e ; valid for balloons only and Style must be set to swBS_SplitCirc (see Remarks )

parameters.name: LowerText
parameters.description: Lower text of the balloon; valid for balloons only and Style must be set to swBS_SplitCirc

parameters.name: CustomSize
parameters.description: User-defined size of the balloon; Size must be set to swBF_UserDef

parameters.name: ShowQuantity
parameters.description: User-defined size of the balloon; Size must be set to swBF_UserDef

parameters.name: QuantityPlacement
parameters.description: True to show quantity, false to not

parameters.name: QuantityDenotationText
parameters.description: True to show quantity, false to not

title: IModelDocExtension.InsertBOMBalloon

CustomSize
,

ShowQuantity
,

QuantityPlacement
,

QuantityDenotationText
)

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Balloon style as defined in swBalloonStyle_e

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Balloon size as defined in swBalloonFit_e

parameters.name: UpperTextStyle
parameters.description: Style for the upper text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: UpperText
parameters.description: Upper text of the balloon

parameters.name: LowerTextStyle
parameters.description: Style for the lower text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e ; valid for balloons only and Style must be set to swBS_SplitCirc (see Remarks )

parameters.name: LowerText
parameters.description: Lower text of the balloon; valid for balloons only and Style must be set to swBS_SplitCirc

parameters.name: CustomSize
parameters.description: User-defined size of the balloon; Size must be set to swBF_UserDef

parameters.name: ShowQuantity
parameters.description: User-defined size of the balloon; Size must be set to swBF_UserDef

parameters.name: QuantityPlacement

parameters.name: QuantityDenotationText

remarks:
See
INote::PropertyLinkedText
for examples of link strings usable with swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCustomProperties.
